name: JumpBlock
description:
At the moment JumpBlock is a prototype of a would be game about building up to escape lava and trying to go as high as you can before the lava catches you.

If anyone actually tries this game then, firstly, thank you so much it means a lot!

And secondly, if you have any suggestions then I'm willing to give them a try and maybe this game will end up being something better.

But anyway publishing this is really a way to say that I decided to finally crack down and start my game development journey. Because as everyone knows, the first step really is the hardest.

I know JumpBlock is by no means  that good of a game in its current state and I know there's plenty of polish like sound and graphics that I can add, so if I think of any good ideas for this project in the future I will definitely return to improve this game (hopefully after having a better idea of what I'm doing).
